minecraft:max_damage.description: Max damage item has, this is used like item max health.

minecraft:block.description: Block name, leave blank for no block.

saturation_modifier.description: Choose: poor, low, normal, good, max, supernatural.

using_converts_to.description: After using,  item converts it to this item.

can_always_eat.description: Can always eat this item? true or false.

plant_at.description: Valid blocks you can plant this item at.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for this item. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

category.description: The category for this item. Categories are used to control high level properties of how the item is integrated into the bedrock engine, such as whether it can be used in slash commands.
category.title: Category

is_experimental.description: If this item is experimental, it will only be registered if the world is marked as experimental.
is_experimental.title: Is Experimental

H.title: Armor
H.description: The armor item componenent determines the amount of protection you have in your armor item.

protection.description: How much protection does the armor item have.
protection.title: Protection

texture_type.description: Texture Type to apply for the armor. Note that Horse armor is restricted to leather, iron, gold, or diamond.
texture_type.title: Texture Type

I_use_on_item.title: Allowed Block
I_use_on_item.description: A block descriptor that allows to be placed

I.title: Block Placer
I.description: Planter item component. planter items are items that can be planted.

block.description: Set the placement block name for the planter item.
block.title: Protection

use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.
use_on.title: Use On

BA.title: Cooldown
BA.description: Cool down time for a component. After you use an item it becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item.
category.title: Category

duration.description: The duration of time this item will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.
duration.title: Duration

BB.title: Digger
BB.description: Digger item. Component put on items that dig.

use_efficiency.title: Use Efficiency
use_efficiency.description: Use efficiency? Default is set to false.

on_dig.title: On Dig
on_dig.description: Trigger for when you dig a block that isn't listed in destroy_speeds

BC.title: Display Name
BC.description: Display Name item component. Display Names display the name of an item.

value.title: Value
value.description: Set the display name for an item.

BD.title: Durability
BD.description: Durability item component: how much damage can this item take before breaking.

max_durability.title: Max Durability
max_durability.description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking.

BE.title: Dye Powder
BE.description: Dye powder, there are 16 kinds of dye.

color.title: Color
color.description: Defines what color the dye is.

BF.title: Entity Placer
BF.description: Entity placer item component. You can specifiy allowed blocks that the item is restricted to.

entity.title: Entity
entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

dispense_on.title: Dispense On
dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

use_on.title: Use On
use_on.description: List of block descriptors that contain blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

BG.title: Food
BG.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

can_always_eat.title: Can Always Eat
can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry), defaults to false.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.description: How much nutrition does this food item give the player when eaten.

saturation_modifier.title: Saturation Modifier
saturation_modifier.description: Saturation Modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when appling the saturation buff. Which happens when you eat the item.

using_converts_to.title: Using Converts To
using_converts_to.description: When used, convert the *this* item to the one specified by 'using_converts_to'.

BH.title: Fuel
BH.description: Fuel component. Allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

duration.title: Duration
duration.description: How long in seconds will this fuel cook items for.

BI.title: Icon
BI.description: The icon item componenent determines the icon to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

frame.title: Frame
frame.description: An index or expression for which frame of the icon to display. Default resolves to 0.

legacy_id.title: Texture
legacy_id.description: Legacy texture id for older item icons.

texture.title: Texture
texture.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file Example: blaze_powder.

BJ.title: Knockback Resistance
BJ.description: Knockback Resistance Item. Component put on items that provide knockback resistance.

protection.title: Protection
protection.description: Amount of knockback resistance provided with the total maximum protection being 1.0

CA.title: On Use
CA.description: The on_use item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used.

on_use.title: On Use
on_use.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

CB.title: On Use On
CB.description: The on_use_on item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used on a block in the world.

on_use.title: On Use
on_use.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

CC.title: Projectile
CC.description: Projectile item component. projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

minimum_critical_power.title: Minimum Critical Power
minimum_critical_power.description: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.title: Projectile Entity
projectile_entity.description: The entity to be fired as a projectile.

CE.title: Molang Number
CE.description: The minecraft molang definition that results in a float

CD.title: Repairable
CD.description: Repairable item component: how much damage can this item repair, what items can repair it.

on_repaired.title: On Repaired
on_repaired.description: Event that is called when this item has been repaired.

CF.title: Render Offsets
CF.description: Render offsets component: optional values can be given to offset the way the item is rendered.

charge_on_draw.title: Charge On Draw
charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.title: Launch Power Scale
launch_power_scale.description: Launch power scale. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.title: Max Draw Duration
max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

max_launch_power.title: Max Launch Power
max_launch_power.description: Launch power. Default is set to 1.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.title: Scale Power By Draw Duration
scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

CH.title: Throwable
CH.description: Throwable item component. Throwable items, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.title: Do Swing Animation
do_swing_animation.description: Whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.title: Launch Power Scale
launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.title: Max Draw Duration
max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

min_draw_duration.title: Min Draw Duration
min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.title: Max Launch Power
max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.title: Scale Power By Draw Duration
scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

CI.title: Weapon
CI.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

on_hit_block.title: On Hit Block
on_hit_block.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block

on_hurt_entity.title: On Hurt Entity
on_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob

on_not_hurt_entity.title: On Not Hurt Entity
on_not_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage

slot.title: Slot
slot.description: equipment_slot: slot.weapon.mainhand, slot.weapon.offhand, slot.armor.head, slot.armor.chest, slot.armor.legs, slot.armor.feet, slot.hotbar, slot.inventory, slot.enderchest, slot.saddle, slot.armor, slot.chest
